caption.p: Cyclic voltammograms of H 2S at the Pt microdisk electrode (diameter = 100 μm) in different electrolytes. ( A) is [bmim][BF 4]; ( B) is [C 3OHmim][BF 4]; ( C) is [C 3OHmim][BF 4] with MEA and atmospheric gases and ( D) is a comparison of cyclovoltamograms between [C 3OHmim][BF 4] and [C 3OHmim][BF 4] with MEA. Scan rate: 50 mV s −1; the circle indicates the open cell potential (OCP) of each system, and the arrow indicates the start direction of the potential scan from OCP. Reproduced with permission from [ 57], copyright 2018, Elsevier.
